data.comment: The match has started at Stadio San Paolo.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 3, In Naples Roma attack through Henrikh Mkhitaryan. The finish is off target, however.
Napoli have a goal kick.
Napoli awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Napoli a goal kick.
Free kick Napoli.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan of Roma is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 11, Napoli drive forward but Lorenzo Insigne is judged offside.
Napoli's Dries Mertens misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio San Paolo.
In the minute 14, Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Roma a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Napoli to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Napoli drives forward and Piotr Zielinski gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Napoli are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick in a good position for Napoli!
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Can Napoli capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Roger Ibanez is booked for the away team.
In the minute 30, Goal! Lorenzo Insigne gives Napoli a 1-0 lead in Naples.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Giovanni Di Lorenzo (Napoli) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 33, Roma pushes forward through Bryan Cristante, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Naples.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a Napoli throw-in in Roma's half.
In the minute 35, Hirving Lozano (Napoli) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Napoli.
Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a first substitution, with Juan Jesus replacing Gianluca Mancini.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Napoli.
In the minute 39, Roma have a goal kick.
Jordan Veretout is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Jordan Veretout for Roma is back on the field again.
Napoli's Dries Mertens is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Roma at Stadio San Paolo.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio San Paolo.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Napoli's Dries Mertens has run offside.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Naples.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Napoli in the half of Roma.
The away team have replaced Jordan Veretout with Gonzalo Villar. This is the second substitution made today by Paulo Fonseca.
Roma needs to be cautious. Napoli have an attacking throw-in.
Napoli's Hirving Lozano gets in a shot on goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Napoli have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 52, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Roma's area.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dries Mertens.
Dries Mertens returns to the field for Napoli after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 56, Roma have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Napoli drive upfield and Piotr Zielinski gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Roma defender.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Roma.
In the minute 57, Napoli have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In Naples Roma drive forward through Edin Dzeko. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan is whistled for offside at Stadio San Paolo.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Great finish from Fabian Ruiz to give Napoli a 2-0 lead.
Lorenzo Insigne instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio San Paolo.
Gennaro Gattuso is making the team's first substitution at Stadio San Paolo with Matteo Politano replacing Hirving Lozano.
In the minute 68, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Napoli's Lorenzo Insigne gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Roma.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Roma a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Diego Demme for Napoli is whistled offside.
Carles Perez is on a sub for Edin Dzeko for Roma.
Lorenzo Pellegrini for Roma gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 72, Napoli have a goal kick.
Roma push forward at Stadio San Paolo and Carles Perez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Napoli defence.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 74, In Naples, Gonzalo Villar of Roma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Bryan Cristante (Roma) has received a yellow card from Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Piotr Zielinski with Eljif Elmas.
Throw-in Napoli.
Roma make their fourth substitution with Borja Mayoral replacing Lorenzo Pellegrini.
In the minute 80, In Naples Napoli's Eljif Elmas is caught offside.
Borja Mayoral for the away team is judged to be offside.
Eljif Elmas of Napoli smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 81, Goal! Dries Mertens extends Napoli's lead to 3-0.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Stanislav Lobotka is replacing Diego Demme for the home team.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
In the minute 84, Andrea Petagna is replacing Dries Mertens for the home team.
Napoli awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Roma.
Goal! Napoli extend their lead to 4-0 through Matteo Politano.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
In the minute 89, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the home team a throw-in.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The match has come to a close in Naples. The final score is 4-0.
